name: ナイトメア の 世界 Tortured Souls
name_original: ナイトメア の 世界 Tortured Souls
description:
"ナイトメア の 世界 Tortured Souls" (NWTS) is an episodic first person horror game that take place in an Anime studio. Play as Satsuki as she revisits her friends 4 years after she stopped working there. Explore and find your friends and discover what happened during these 4 years in the depths of Kisaragi Studios

But from above all... save them....
